name: Ero Manager
description:
Game Background

As a new guy, he is so nervous to report to his direct boss that he has never met before, but he didn't expect it to be a stern female boss like a queen. But this is what it looks like, but in reality, no one knows about her inner feelings. Challenge her bravely, and you may find out her secret.

Game Description

This game is a casual game where you can control your demon boss by flying and jumping, avoiding many obstacles to reach the end, and gaining her favor.

How to play

Press "space" to fly up, press the space bar uninterruptedly to maintain and improve the height of the leap, the faster the frequency of pressing the space bar, the higher the height of the leap.
Players will encounter some props in the scene, these props have a positive and negative effect.
If the controlled character collides with the obstacles, the game will fail.

Game features

  • Interesting gameplay.
  • 30 new levels.
  • 10 CG
  • Blues style music.
  • Sexy boss.
  • Variety of costumes and props.
  • Intriguing interactive mode.


Click on the upper right to learn more about the new game, and there are beautiful CGs waiting for you to discover, as well as hidden badges and surprise achievements to unlock.

We are Lovely Games, Focus on us not getting lost ~
